attributes.action: Stop the change to pension credit without a proper consultation
attributes.additional_details: There is no mention of any considerations tailored to individual circumstances of the aged for example if the younger person in the relationship  is disabled then how would UC be of any help pushing them into work when they are unable and their partner is losing out the credits. Would like to ask the house to debate and stop this cruel change
attributes.background: Upcoming change to pension credit which has been sneaked out during a historic debate on brexit is unfair for many pensioners out there who  have contributed all their lives to the economy only for the state now to penalise them for being in a mix age relationship.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure which change to pension credit you would like a consultation on.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the policy you are concerned about.
